name: Tixbase
description: Tixbase is a B2B ticketing solution that lets event organizers / ticket companies, fully control the planning, launch, and resale of their tickets.

chains.name: Tixbase
chains.description: TixChain is a dedicated network that serves as the foundation for the Tixbase ticketing platform. It provides a secure, transparent, and scalable infrastructure for managing ticket transactions and ensuring the authenticity of tickets.
